long_description: Use the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 rechargeable battery pack in place of 4 D disposable batteries in your Coleman CPX 6-compatible appliances (sold separately). Battery pack powers all Coleman CPX 6-compatible products, including the Coleman Signature High Tech CPX lantern and the Coleman Tent Fan with LED (sold separately). Simply charge the battery pack via a standard wall outlet or car power source and snap it into your Coleman CPX 6 lantern, spotlight, fan, sink or air pump (sold separately). LED displays red when the battery is charging and green when the battery is fully charged. Battery pack is powered by a 6V 2.36Ah sealed lead-acid battery. Coleman CPX(TM) rechargeable battery pack includes the battery pack, a 120V wall charger and a 12V car charger.
short_description: Use the Coleman CPX(TM) 6 rechargeable battery pack in place of 4 D disposable batteries in your Coleman CPX 6-compatible appliances (sold separately).
